Package c195

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
c195.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
MainController handles all events for the main scheduler UI.
Since:
2021-06-10
Version:
1.0
Author:
Austin Anderson

      private void initTabs()
      Initializes the tabs on the main view and calls functions to initialize each tab's view. Lambda expression used to loop through tabs elements more efficiently passing the tab object.
